TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Csc extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ManagedCompiler

summary.span: 實作 Csc 工作。

span.span: Implements the Csc task.

summary.span: 請使用專案檔中的 Csc 元素，來建立和執行這項工作。

span.span: Use the Csc element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 如需用法和參數資訊，請參閱 [Csc 工作](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8c19b36-f5ca-484b-afa6-8ff3b90e103a)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [Csc Task](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8c19b36-f5ca-484b-afa6-8ff3b90e103a).

member this.BaseAddress : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定載入 DLL 時慣用的基底位址。

span.span: Gets or sets the preferred base address at which to load a DLL.

value.span: 載入 DLL 時慣用的基底位址。

span.span: The preferred base address at which to load a DLL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DLL 的預設基底位址是由 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 通用語言執行平台所設定。The default base address for a DLL is set by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] common language runtime. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [/baseaddress (C# 編譯器選項)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/baseaddress-compiler-option.md)。For more information, see [/baseaddress (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/baseaddress-compiler-option.md).

Protected Overrides Function CallHostObjectToExecute () As Boolean

summary.span: 透過主物件來編譯專案。

span.span: Compiles the project through the host object.

returns.span: 如果編譯成功，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if compilation succeeded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法會取得在執行期間如果主應用程式物件傳遞至`Csc`工作。This method will get called during execution if a host object was passed to the `Csc` task.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 Csc 工作針對超出資料類型範圍的整數算術，是否應該導致在執行階段發生例外狀況。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the Csc task should cause an exception at run time for integer arithmetic that overflows the bounds of the data type.

value.span: 如果Csc工作應該導致在發生例外狀況執行時間超出範圍的資料類型的整數算術，否則。

span.span: if the Csc task should cause an exception at run time for integer arithmetic that overflows the bounds of the data type; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [/checked (C# 編譯器選項)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/checked-compiler-option.md)。For more information, see [/checked (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/checked-compiler-option.md).

summary.span: 如果為 true，則會輸出每個錯誤結束位置的行和資料行。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ErrorReport { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ErrorReport : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定向 Microsoft 報告 C# 編譯器內部錯誤的方法。

span.span: Gets or sets the method to report a C# internal compiler error to Microsoft.

value.span: 向 Microsoft 報告 C# 編譯器內部錯誤的方法。

span.span: The method to report a C# internal compiler error to Microsoft.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可以有值`prompt`， `send`，或`none`。This property can have a value of `prompt`, `send`, or `none`. 如果屬性設定為`prompt`，編譯器內部錯誤發生時，您會收到提示。If the property is set to `prompt`, you will receive a prompt when an internal compiler error occurs. 此提示可讓您以電子方式將錯誤報告傳送給 Microsoft。The prompt lets you send a bug report electronically to Microsoft. 如果屬性設定為`send`，就會自動傳送錯誤報告。If the property is set to `send`, a bug report is sent automatically. 如果屬性設定為`none`，只在編譯器的文字輸出中報告的錯誤。If the property is set to `none`, the error is reported only in the text output of the compiler. 預設為 `none`。Default is `none`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [/errorreport (C# 編譯器選項)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/errorreport-compiler-option.md)。For more information, see [/errorreport (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/errorreport-compiler-option.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool GenerateFullPaths { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.GenerateFullPaths : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，指出要在編譯器輸出中產生檔案的絕對路徑 ()，還是要在編譯器輸出中產生檔案的名稱 ()。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether to generate the absolute path to the file in the compiler output () or to generate the name of the file in the compiler output ().

value.span: 如果Csc工作應該產生檔案的絕對路徑，在編譯器輸出中。如果Csc工作應該在編譯器輸出中產生檔案的名稱。

span.span: if the Csc task should generate the absolute path to the file in the compiler output; if the Csc task should generate the name of the file in the compiler output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設為 `false`。The default is `false`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [/fullpaths (C# 編譯器選項)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/fullpaths-compiler-option.md)。For more information, see [/fullpaths (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/fullpaths-compiler-option.md).

Protected Overrides Function GenerateFullPathToTool () As String

span.span: Returns the full file path of the Csc tool.

returns.span: Csc 工具的完整檔案路徑。

span.span: The full file path of the Csc tool.

summary.span: 傳回主物件初始設定狀態值，這個值表示下一個動作應該是什麼。

span.span: Returns a host object initialization status value that indicates what the next action should be.

returns.span: 表示下一個動作應該是什麼的主物件初始設定狀態值。

span.span: A host object initialization status value that indicates what the next action should be.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主應用程式物件會傳遞至，會取得這項工作執行期間呼叫這個方法`Csc`工作。This method will get called during execution of this task if a host object was passed to the `Csc` task.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool NoStandardLib { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.NoStandardLib : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，這個值表示 Csc 工作是否應該防止匯入 mscorlib.dll (其定義整個系統命名空間)。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the Csc task should prevent the import of mscorlib.dll, which defines the entire System namespace.

value.span: 如果Csc工作應該防止匯入 mscorlib.dll; 否則。

span.span: if the Csc task should prevent the import of mscorlib.dll; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要定義或建立您自己的系統命名空間和物件，請使用這個屬性。Use this property if you want to define or create your own System namespace and objects. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [/nostdlib (C# 編譯器選項)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/nostdlib-compiler-option.md)。For more information, see [/nostdlib (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/nostdlib-compiler-option.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Platform { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Platform : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要做為輸出檔目標的處理器平台。

span.span: Gets or sets the processor platform to be targeted by the output file.

value.span: 輸出檔設為目標的處理器平台。

span.span: The processor platform to be targeted by the output file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可以有值**x86**， **x64**，或**anycpu**。This property can have a value of **x86**, **x64**, or **anycpu**. 預設值是**anycpu**。Default is **anycpu**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [/platform (C# 編譯器選項)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/platform-compiler-option.md)。For more information, see [/platform (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/platform-compiler-option.md).

member this.PreferredUILang : string with get, set

summary.span: 傳遞給 "/preferreduilang" 編譯器選項的語言名稱。

span.span: The name of the language passed to the "/preferreduilang" compiler option.
The name of the language.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果設為 null，"/ preferreduilang"省略時，編譯器會使用其預設值。If set to null, "/preferreduilang" is omitted and the compiler uses its default setting.
